channel.title: torchtext on KK's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in torchtext on KK's Blog

item.title: Torchtext snippets
item.description: Load separate files #data.Field parameters is here. When calling build_vocab, torchtext will add <unk> in vocabulary list. Set unk_token=None if you want to remove it. If sequential=True (default), it will add <pad> in vocab. <unk> and <pad> will add at the beginning of vocabulary list by default.
